body.name: Kiato Handheld Steam Cleaner, 10 in 1 Hand Held Steamer for Cleaning, Portable Pressurized Steamer for Home Use, Bathroom, Mini Steam Cleaners for Upholstery Furniture Sofa Couch Floor Tile Grout Car
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 14 mins
features: 𝗖𝗢𝗡𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗡𝗧 𝗦𝘁𝗲𝗮𝗺 𝗣𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗿𝗲：This handheld steamer can continuously steam out for about 8 minutes WITHOUT INTERVALS, unlike other car carpet cleaner that has to stop to build the pressure after every 1 or 2 minutes’ spraying(Some rug cleaner may just work for 20 seconds at a time and so you have to wait and wait for it to heat up).Our upgraded pet carpet cleaner does save your time and boost your efficiency.

𝗡𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗮𝗹 & 𝗠𝘂𝗹𝘁𝗶-𝗣𝘂𝗿𝗽𝗼𝘀𝗲 𝗨𝘀𝗲：Deep cleans without the use of cleaning things. Our handheld steam cleaner unit is best suited for sealed surfaces including ceramic, vinyl, laminate, granite, marble, hardwood floors, and it’s great for sinks, stoves, countertops, refrigerators, kitchen, floor, living room, windows, toilet, tiles, shower curtains, bathroom, pet toilet, car Seats and rims, grill, BBQ, kids toy, mattresses, linen, duvet cover, fabric, and sofa cleaning.

𝟮𝟱𝟬𝗺𝗹 𝗖𝗮𝗽𝗮𝗰𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝗪𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝗧𝗮𝗻𝗸：This handheld steamer for cleaning features an extra large water tank of 450ml capacity(The recommended load capacity is within 250ml so as to leave a certain space to ensure normal use). This large steam cleaner allows you to focus on cleaning, instead of refilling often. Lightweight, portable, and with a long power cord(16.4ft), this handheld carpet cleaner can go further and work distantly.

𝟭𝟬-𝗽𝗶𝗲𝗰𝗲 𝗔𝗰𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗼𝗿𝘆 𝗦𝗲𝘁：This steamer does an amazing job of cleaning and ironing. Plus 10-piece accessory kit such as: angled nozzle, bendable extension, nozzle with brush, fabric steamer tool, rubber wiper for window/door, and many other extras. It’s all-purpose and can go and clean out any hard to reach gaps, corners, angles, and also various surfaces/materials.

𝗖𝗵𝗲𝗺𝗶𝗰𝗮𝗹-𝗳𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗛𝗲𝗮𝗹𝘁𝗵𝘆：This portable carpet steamer cleans by hot pressured steam to remove dirt and grease. No chemical residue on your utensils, pet mattresses, kids’ toys. Try this couch cleaner, you will surely appreciate such a helpful and safe cleaning wizard and definitely go crazy with it.

productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 835 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #94,724 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen) #23 in Handheld Steamers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It steams well
reviews.reviewText: I returned mine as I bought it to clean grout, not enough steam meant notenough heat. Worked well on sinks ect. Nicely made, stean in two minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little steamer!
reviews.reviewText: Heats up quick, puts out a great stream of steam ... light weight and easy to use.... highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Heat's up fast. Has long elec. cord.
reviews.reviewText: I like how light it is and how handle fits your hand the way it is made to fit any size hand makes it easy to steam clean small space area's like bathroom . Works great on bathtub,sink, corner's of shower door.in kitchen it works great around sink area, countertop, doorknob,seats and back of chairs . It heats up super fast I mean it's seams like minutes and it ready to go when the water runs out it has a safety features that won't let you open top cap until it cools down it doesn't take long and then when you see the little red button on the very top go down it cool enough to open. It helps to push trigger button to let out any leftover built up stream. I also think it is very well made it has a good solid one piece appearance and a electrical cord that is long enough to reach good size areas without having to unplug and replug constantly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great steamer for grout
reviews.reviewText: Worked great. Very easy to use. Heated up very quickly. The only negative is the button. After using for awhile it is hard on your thumb.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars the hot steam it produces does not totally eliminate grease from kitchen counters
reviews.reviewText: it is not the ideal hot steamer for kitchen counters and stove top, however it does not seem like the market is so far not offering better alternative.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not for cleaning
reviews.reviewText: doesn’t release hot steam it releases a cold steam which is useless for disinfecting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for cleaning/disinfecting
reviews.reviewText: I have only tried it once since I got it but I was impressed. I used it on my kitchen sink and hose. It removed gunk from the faucet and hose. I have many plans for this as far as cleaning and disinfecting my house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars so far it works well - steam is very strong
reviews.reviewText: hope it lasts more than a year - thank you.
